DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to study the benefits and risks of etanercept withdrawal in patients who have achieved a significant clinical response.
DOC.brief_title: Etanercept Withdrawal And Retreament Study In Subjects With Nr-ax SpA
DOC.detailed_description: This multcenter, open-label, three period study will evaluate withdrawal and retreatment of etanercept in subjects with nr-ax SpA who achieved adequate response following 24 weeks of treatment.
DOC.criteria: diagnosis of axial SpA duration of symptoms >3 months and <5 years back pain with a less than favorable response to NSAIDs radiological sacroiliitis previous treatment with TNF inhibitor, biologic, immunosuppressive
